sources.title: Strauss' Great Waltz (1934) Alfred Hitchcock | Music, Biography | Colorized Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
Johann Strauss is inspired to compose the "Blue Danube" waltz after watching bakers toss rolls and mix batter.

Original title: Waltzes from Vienna (1934) AKA Strauss' Great Waltz 

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/qlNRL4GOyiI

Director: Alfred Hitchcock
Writers: Heinz Reichert, Ernst Marischka, Guy Bolton
Stars: Edmund Gwenn, Esmond Knight, Jessie Matthews, Fay Compton
Genres: Biography, Music, Romance

@CultCinemaClassics:
https://www.facebook.com/CultCinemaClassics 
https://www.tiktok.com/@cultcinemaclassics
https://www.instagram.com/cultcinemaclassics

metadata.Plot: Schani, Johan Strauss Jr., is forced by his father to forget music and to work in a bakery. Here he falls in love with Resi. The girl gets very jealous when a rich and beautiful contessa asks Schani to write a waltz for her. Schani writes and plays it, but he is always loyal to his girlfriend.
metadata.Writer: Heinz Reichert, A.M. Willner, Ernst Marischka
metadata.Actors: Edmund Gwenn, Esmond Knight, Jessie Matthews
